constituent: kiln, hole, house, human legs, sheep, oven-fire, barbecue
koohiiStory1: Be sure to put a hole in that ceramic sheep before you put it over the fire. Otherwise, it´ll just explode in the kiln. (If you´ve never done ceramics before, it´s important that the object have a hole in it, or this really will happen.).
koohiiStory2: You put the sheep in the hole of the kiln and turn on the flames.
